title: The Choice
creator_credit: Millbank Films, Imperial Chemical Industries and Gordon Begg
brief_description: Surveys the results of pollution by all kinds of waste products in the natural environment: air, water and land, and discusses the counter-measures and better disposal methods being used. Stresses the need for industry, commerce, individuals and the community to be prepared to take action.
